casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, AS TRUSTEE, on Behalf of the HOLDERS OF THE ASSET BACKED PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES RFC 20017-HE1, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Eric HAYDEN and Miesha Hardison-Hayden, Defendants-Petitioners,
and
Wells Fargo Financial Bank, Defendant. C-1078 September Term 2018
082531 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 9, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001610-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
